channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-16543|2024-08-05T01:17:40.220Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20spira%20importer%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Spira Importer Plugin 3.2.2 and earlier stores credentials unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-16546|2024-08-05T01:17:40.240Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20google%20compute%20engine%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Google Compute Engine Plugin 4.1.1 and earlier does not verify SSH host keys when connecting agents created by the plugin, enabling man-in-the-middle attacks.

item.title: CVE-2019-16550|2024-08-05T01:17:40.818Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20maven%20release%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in a connection test form method in Jenkins Maven Release Plugin 0.16.1 and earlier allows attackers to have Jenkins connect to an attacker specified web server and parse XML documents.

item.title: CVE-2019-16575|2024-08-05T01:17:40.906Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20alauda%20kubernetes%20suport%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Alauda Kubernetes Suport Plugin 2.3.0 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing the Kubernetes service account token or credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2019-16538|2024-08-05T01:17:40.259Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1.67 and earlier related to the handling of default parameter expressions in closures allowed attackers to execute arbitrary code in sandboxed scripts.

item.title: CVE-2019-16561|2024-08-05T01:17:41.047Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20websphere%20deployer%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins WebSphere Deployer Plugin 1.6.1 and earlier allows users with Overall/Read access to disable SSL/TLS certificate and hostname validation for the entire Jenkins master JVM.

item.title: CVE-2019-16552|2024-08-05T01:17:40.885Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gerrit%20trigger%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Gerrit Trigger Plugin 2.30.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP URL or SSH server using attacker-specified credentials, or determine the existence of a file with a given path on the Jenkins master.

item.title: CVE-2019-16574|2024-08-05T01:17:40.996Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20alauda%20devops%20pipeline%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Alauda DevOps Pipeline Plugin 2.3.2 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2019-16553|2024-08-05T01:17:40.794Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build%20failure%20analyzer%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Build Failure Analyzer Plugin 1.24.1 and earlier allows attackers to have Jenkins evaluate a computationally expensive regular expression.

item.title: CVE-2019-16565|2024-08-05T01:17:41.026Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20team%20concert%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Team Concert Plugin 1.3.0 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2019-16566|2024-08-05T01:17:41.065Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20team%20concert%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Team Concert Plugin 1.3.0 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2019-16556|2024-08-05T01:17:41.007Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20rundeck%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Rundeck Plugin 3.6.5 and earlier stores credentials unencrypted in its global configuration file and in job config.xml files on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-16570|2024-08-05T01:17:40.997Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20rapiddeploy%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins RapidDeploy Plugin 4.1 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified web server.

item.title: CVE-2019-16555|2024-08-05T01:17:41.026Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build%20failure%20analyzer%20plugin
item.description: A user-supplied regular expression in Jenkins Build Failure Analyzer Plugin 1.24.1 and earlier was processed in a way that wasn't interruptible, allowing attackers to have Jenkins evaluate a regular expression without the ability to interrupt this process.

item.title: CVE-2019-16545|2024-08-05T01:17:40.302Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20qmetry%20for%20jira%20-%20test%20management%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins QMetry for JIRA - Test Management Plugin transmits credentials in its configuration in plain text as part of job configuration forms, potentially resulting in their exposure.

item.title: CVE-2019-16576|2024-08-05T01:17:41.023Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20alauda%20kubernetes%20suport%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Alauda Kubernetes Suport Plugin 2.3.0 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing the Kubernetes service account token or credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2019-16569|2024-08-05T01:17:40.898Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mantis%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Mantis Plugin 0.26 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified web server using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2019-16551|2024-08-05T01:17:40.778Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gerrit%20trigger%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Gerrit Trigger Plugin 2.30.1 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP URL or SSH server using attacker-specified credentials.

item.title: CVE-2019-16547|2024-08-05T01:17:40.265Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20google%20compute%20engine%20plugin
item.description: Missing permission checks in various API endpoints in Jenkins Google Compute Engine Plugin 4.1.1 and earlier allow attackers with Overall/Read permission to obtain limited information about the plugin configuration and environment.

item.title: CVE-2019-16559|2024-08-05T01:17:40.812Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20websphere%20deployer%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins WebSphere Deployer Plugin 1.6.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to perform connection tests and determine whether files with an attacker-specified path exist on the Jenkins master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-16549|2024-08-05T01:17:40.903Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20maven%20release%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Maven Release Plugin 0.16.1 and earlier does not configure the XML parser to prevent XML external entity (XXE) attacks, allowing man-in-the-middle attackers to have Jenkins parse crafted XML documents.

item.title: CVE-2019-16548|2024-08-05T01:17:40.791Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20google%20compute%20engine%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Google Compute Engine Plugin 4.1.1 and earlier in ComputeEngineCloud#doProvision could be used to provision new agents.

item.title: CVE-2019-16572|2024-08-05T01:17:41.015Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20weibo%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Weibo Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier stores credentials unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-16568|2024-08-05T01:17:40.841Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20sctmexecutor%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins SCTMExecutor Plugin 2.2 and earlier transmits previously configured service credentials in plain text as part of the global configuration, as well as individual jobs' configurations.

item.title: CVE-2019-16554|2024-08-05T01:17:40.801Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build%20failure%20analyzer%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Build Failure Analyzer Plugin 1.24.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to have Jenkins evaluate a computationally expensive regular expression.

item.title: CVE-2019-16540|2024-08-05T01:17:40.283Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20support%20core%20plugin
item.description: A path traversal vulnerability in Jenkins Support Core Plugin 2.63 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to delete arbitrary files on the Jenkins master.

item.title: CVE-2019-16542|2024-08-05T01:17:40.255Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20anchore%20container%20image%20scanner%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Anchore Container Image Scanner Plugin 1.0.19 and earlier stores credentials unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-16573|2024-08-05T01:17:41.037Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20alauda%20devops%20pipeline%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins Alauda DevOps Pipeline Plugin 2.3.2 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified URL using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2019-16558|2024-08-05T01:17:41.027Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20spira%20importer%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Spira Importer Plugin 3.2.3 and earlier disables SSL/TLS certificate validation for the Jenkins master JVM.

item.title: CVE-2019-16563|2024-08-05T01:17:40.824Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mission%20control%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Mission Control Plugin 0.9.16 and earlier does not escape job display names and build names shown on its view, resulting in a stored XSS vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to change these properties.

item.title: CVE-2019-16557|2024-08-05T01:17:40.840Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20redgate%20sql%20change%20automation%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Redgate SQL Change Automation Plugin 2.0.3 and earlier stores credentials unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-16560|2024-08-05T01:17:41.041Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20websphere%20deployer%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins WebSphere Deployer Plugin 1.6.1 and earlier allows attackers to perform connection tests and determine whether files with an attacker-specified path exist on the Jenkins master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-16571|2024-08-05T01:17:41.021Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20rapiddeploy%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins RapidDeploy Plugin 4.1 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified web server.

item.title: CVE-2019-16567|2024-08-05T01:17:41.030Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20team%20concert%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Team Concert Plugin 1.3.0 and earlier in form-related methods allowed users with Overall/Read access to enumerate credentials ID of credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2019-16562|2024-08-05T01:17:41.027Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20buildgraph-view%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins buildgraph-view Plugin 1.8 and earlier does not escape the description of builds shown in its view, resulting in a stored XSS vulnerability exploitable by users able to change build descriptions.

item.title: CVE-2019-16564|2024-08-05T01:17:41.024Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20pipeline%20aggregator%20view%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Pipeline Aggregator View Plugin 1.8 and earlier does not escape information shown on its view, resulting in a stored XSS vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to affects view content such as job display name or pipeline stage names.

item.title: CVE-2019-16544|2024-08-05T01:17:40.979Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20qmetry%20for%20jira%20-%20test%20management%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins QMetry for JIRA - Test Management Plugin 1.12 and earlier stores credentials unencrypted in job config.xml files on the Jenkins master where they can be viewed by users with Extended Read permission, or access to the master file system.

item.title: CVE-2019-16539|2024-08-05T01:17:40.199Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20support%20core%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Support Core Plugin 2.63 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to delete support bundles.

item.title: CVE-2019-16541|2024-08-05T01:17:40.816Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20jira%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins JIRA Plugin 3.0.10 and earlier does not declare the correct (folder) scope for per-folder Jira site definitions, allowing users to select and use credentials with System scope.

item.title: CVE-2024-39460|2024-08-02T04:26:15.217Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 886.v44cf5e4ecec5 and earlier prints the Bitbucket OAuth access token as part of the Bitbucket URL in the build log in some cases.

item.title: CVE-2024-39459|2024-08-02T04:26:14.969Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20plain%20credentials%20plugin
item.description: In rare cases Jenkins Plain Credentials Plugin 182.v468b_97b_9dcb_8 and earlier stores secret file credentials unencrypted (only Base64 encoded) on the Jenkins controller file system, where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system (global credentials) or with Item/Extended Read permission (folder-scoped credentials).

item.title: CVE-2024-39458|2024-08-02T04:26:14.270Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20structs%20plugin
item.description: When Jenkins Structs Plugin 337.v1b_04ea_4df7c8 and earlier fails to configure a build step, it logs a warning message containing diagnostic information that may contain secrets passed as step parameters, potentially resulting in accidental exposure of secrets through the default system log.

item.title: CVE-2024-28161|2024-08-02T00:48:49.181Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20delphix%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Delphix Plugin 3.0.1, a global option for administrators to enable or disable SSL/TLS certificate validation for Data Control Tower (DCT) connections is disabled by default.

item.title: CVE-2024-28151|2024-08-02T00:48:49.387Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.32 and earlier archives invalid symbolic links in report directories on agents and recreates them on the controller, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to determine whether a path on the Jenkins controller file system exists, without being able to access it.

item.title: CVE-2024-28149|2024-08-02T00:48:48.971Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.16 through 1.32 (both inclusive) does not properly sanitize input, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to implement cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks and to determine whether a path on the Jenkins controller file system exists.

item.title: CVE-2024-28154|2024-08-02T00:48:49.469Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mq%20notifier%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins MQ Notifier Plugin 1.4.0 and earlier logs potentially sensitive build parameters as part of debug information in build logs by default.

item.title: CVE-2024-28153|2024-08-02T00:48:49.418Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20owasp%20dependency-check%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OWASP Dependency-Check Plugin 5.4.5 and earlier does not escape vulnerability metadata from Dependency-Check reports, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28150|2024-08-02T00:48:49.113Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.32 and earlier does not escape job names, report names, and index page titles shown as part of the report frame, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2024-28152|2024-08-02T00:48:49.402Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 866.vdea_7dcd3008e and earlier, except 848.850.v6a_a_2a_234a_c81, when discovering pull requests from forks, the trust policy "Forks in the same account" allows changes to Jenkinsfiles from users without write access to the project when using Bitbucket Server.

item.title: CVE-2024-28160|2024-08-02T00:48:49.535Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20icescrum%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins iceScrum Plugin 1.1.6 and earlier does not sanitize iceScrum project URLs on build views, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure jobs.

item.title: CVE-2024-28159|2024-08-02T00:48:49.359Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier allows attackers with Item/Read permission to trigger a build.

item.title: CVE-2024-28158|2024-08-02T00:48:49.142Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier allows attackers to trigger a build.

item.title: CVE-2024-28157|2024-08-02T00:48:49.359Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gitbucket%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins GitBucket Plugin 0.8 and earlier does not sanitize Gitbucket URLs on build views, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure jobs.

item.title: CVE-2024-28155|2024-08-02T00:48:49.350Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20appspider%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins AppSpider Plugin 1.0.16 and earlier does not perform permission checks in several HTTP endpoints, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to obtain information about available scan config names, engine group names, and client names.

item.title: CVE-2024-28156|2024-08-02T00:48:49.459Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build%20monitor%20view%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Build Monitor View Plugin 1.14-860.vd06ef2568b_3f and earlier does not escape Build Monitor View names, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure Build Monitor Views.

item.title: CVE-2024-28162|2024-08-02T00:48:49.411Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20delphix%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Delphix Plugin 3.0.1 through 3.1.0 (both inclusive) a global option for administrators to enable or disable SSL/TLS certificate validation for Data Control Tower (DCT) connections fails to take effect until Jenkins is restarted when switching from disabled validation to enabled validation.

item.title: CVE-2024-2216|2024-08-01T19:03:39.393Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20docker-build-step%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in an HTTP endpoint in Jenkins docker-build-step Plugin 2.11 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified TCP or Unix socket URL, and to reconfigure the plugin using the provided connection test parameters, affecting future build step executions.

item.title: CVE-2024-2215|2024-08-01T19:03:39.139Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20docker-build-step%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins docker-build-step Plugin 2.11 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified TCP or Unix socket URL, and to reconfigure the plugin using the provided connection test parameters, affecting future build step executions.

item.title: CVE-2024-28157|2024-07-23T15:53:18.459Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gitbucket%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins GitBucket Plugin 0.8 and earlier does not sanitize Gitbucket URLs on build views, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure jobs.

item.title: CVE-2024-39458|2024-07-05T17:22:42.883Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20structs%20plugin
item.description: When Jenkins Structs Plugin 337.v1b_04ea_4df7c8 and earlier fails to configure a build step, it logs a warning message containing diagnostic information that may contain secrets passed as step parameters, potentially resulting in accidental exposure of secrets through the default system log.

item.title: CVE-2024-39459|2024-06-26T18:32:51.005Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20plain%20credentials%20plugin
item.description: In rare cases Jenkins Plain Credentials Plugin 182.v468b_97b_9dcb_8 and earlier stores secret file credentials unencrypted (only Base64 encoded) on the Jenkins controller file system, where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system (global credentials) or with Item/Extended Read permission (folder-scoped credentials).

item.title: CVE-2024-28157|2024-03-06T17:01:59.358Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20gitbucket%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins GitBucket Plugin 0.8 and earlier does not sanitize Gitbucket URLs on build views, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure jobs.

item.title: CVE-2024-28161|2024-06-04T18:04:02.925Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20delphix%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Delphix Plugin 3.0.1, a global option for administrators to enable or disable SSL/TLS certificate validation for Data Control Tower (DCT) connections is disabled by default.

item.title: CVE-2024-28160|2024-06-04T18:03:57.423Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20icescrum%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins iceScrum Plugin 1.1.6 and earlier does not sanitize iceScrum project URLs on build views, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure jobs.

item.title: CVE-2024-28156|2024-06-04T18:03:53.240Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20build%20monitor%20view%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Build Monitor View Plugin 1.14-860.vd06ef2568b_3f and earlier does not escape Build Monitor View names, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to configure Build Monitor Views.

item.title: CVE-2024-28151|2024-06-04T18:03:47.410Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.32 and earlier archives invalid symbolic links in report directories on agents and recreates them on the controller, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to determine whether a path on the Jenkins controller file system exists, without being able to access it.

item.title: CVE-2024-28150|2024-06-04T18:03:41.778Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.32 and earlier does not escape job names, report names, and index page titles shown as part of the report frame, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers with Item/Configure permission.

item.title: CVE-2024-28149|2024-06-04T18:03:30.882Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20html%20publisher%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins HTML Publisher Plugin 1.16 through 1.32 (both inclusive) does not properly sanitize input, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to implement cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks and to determine whether a path on the Jenkins controller file system exists.

item.title: CVE-2024-28153|2024-06-04T18:03:26.345Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20owasp%20dependency-check%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins OWASP Dependency-Check Plugin 5.4.5 and earlier does not escape vulnerability metadata from Dependency-Check reports, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2024-28152|2024-03-06T17:01:56.184Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 866.vdea_7dcd3008e and earlier, except 848.850.v6a_a_2a_234a_c81, when discovering pull requests from forks, the trust policy "Forks in the same account" allows changes to Jenkinsfiles from users without write access to the project when using Bitbucket Server.

item.title: CVE-2024-28155|2024-06-04T18:03:13.356Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20appspider%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins AppSpider Plugin 1.0.16 and earlier does not perform permission checks in several HTTP endpoints, allowing attackers with Overall/Read permission to obtain information about available scan config names, engine group names, and client names.

item.title: CVE-2024-28159|2024-03-06T17:02:00.731Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier allows attackers with Item/Read permission to trigger a build.

item.title: CVE-2024-28158|2024-03-06T17:01:59.995Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier allows attackers to trigger a build.

item.title: CVE-2024-28162|2024-06-04T18:03:09.469Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20delphix%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Delphix Plugin 3.0.1 through 3.1.0 (both inclusive) a global option for administrators to enable or disable SSL/TLS certificate validation for Data Control Tower (DCT) connections fails to take effect until Jenkins is restarted when switching from disabled validation to enabled validation.

item.title: CVE-2024-28154|2024-06-04T18:03:06.484Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20mq%20notifier%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins MQ Notifier Plugin 1.4.0 and earlier logs potentially sensitive build parameters as part of debug information in build logs by default.

item.title: CVE-2024-5273|2024-05-24T13:46:09.897Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20report%20info%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Report Info Plugin 1.2 and earlier does not perform path validation of the workspace directory while serving report files, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to retrieve Surefire failures, PMD violations, Findbugs bugs, and Checkstyle errors on the controller file system by editing the workspace path.

item.title: CVE-2024-34144|2024-06-06T18:23:11.386Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving crafted constructor bodies in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-34148|2024-06-04T17:42:07.420Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier programmatically disables the fix for CVE-2016-3721 whenever a build is triggered from a release tag, by setting the Java system property 'hudson.model.ParametersAction.keepUndefinedParameters'.

item.title: CVE-2024-34145|2024-06-06T18:23:32.356Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving sandbox-defined classes that shadow specific non-sandbox-defined classes in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-34146|2024-06-04T17:41:47.091Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20git%20server%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Git server Plugin 114.v068a_c7cc2574 and earlier does not perform a permission check for read access to a Git repository over SSH, allowing attackers with a previously configured SSH public key but lacking Overall/Read permission to access these repositories.

item.title: CVE-2024-34147|2024-06-04T17:41:24.679Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20telegram%20bot%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Telegram Bot Plugin 1.4.0 and earlier stores the Telegram Bot token unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.

item.title: CVE-2024-2215|2024-03-06T17:01:52.007Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20docker-build-step%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins docker-build-step Plugin 2.11 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified TCP or Unix socket URL, and to reconfigure the plugin using the provided connection test parameters, affecting future build step executions.

item.title: CVE-2024-2216|2024-03-06T17:01:52.616Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20docker-build-step%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in an HTTP endpoint in Jenkins docker-build-step Plugin 2.11 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified TCP or Unix socket URL, and to reconfigure the plugin using the provided connection test parameters, affecting future build step executions.

item.title: CVE-2024-39458|2024-06-26T17:06:26.399Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20structs%20plugin
item.description: When Jenkins Structs Plugin 337.v1b_04ea_4df7c8 and earlier fails to configure a build step, it logs a warning message containing diagnostic information that may contain secrets passed as step parameters, potentially resulting in accidental exposure of secrets through the default system log.

item.title: CVE-2024-39460|2024-06-26T17:06:27.695Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 886.v44cf5e4ecec5 and earlier prints the Bitbucket OAuth access token as part of the Bitbucket URL in the build log in some cases.

item.title: CVE-2024-39459|2024-06-26T17:06:27.043Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20plain%20credentials%20plugin
item.description: In rare cases Jenkins Plain Credentials Plugin 182.v468b_97b_9dcb_8 and earlier stores secret file credentials unencrypted (only Base64 encoded) on the Jenkins controller file system, where they can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system (global credentials) or with Item/Extended Read permission (folder-scoped credentials).

item.title: CVE-2024-39460|2024-06-26T19:00:20.037Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 886.v44cf5e4ecec5 and earlier prints the Bitbucket OAuth access token as part of the Bitbucket URL in the build log in some cases.

item.title: CVE-2024-39458|2024-07-05T20:18:50.446Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20structs%20plugin
item.description: When Jenkins Structs Plugin 337.v1b_04ea_4df7c8 and earlier fails to configure a build step, it logs a warning message containing diagnostic information that may contain secrets passed as step parameters, potentially resulting in accidental exposure of secrets through the default system log.

item.title: CVE-2024-2215|2024-07-25T19:52:01.223Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20docker-build-step%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins docker-build-step Plugin 2.11 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified TCP or Unix socket URL, and to reconfigure the plugin using the provided connection test parameters, affecting future build step executions.

item.title: CVE-2024-28152|2024-07-25T19:50:54.373Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20bitbucket%20branch%20source%20plugin
item.description: In Jenkins Bitbucket Branch Source Plugin 866.vdea_7dcd3008e and earlier, except 848.850.v6a_a_2a_234a_c81, when discovering pull requests from forks, the trust policy "Forks in the same account" allows changes to Jenkinsfiles from users without write access to the project when using Bitbucket Server.

item.title: CVE-2024-5273|2024-08-01T21:11:12.451Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20report%20info%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Report Info Plugin 1.2 and earlier does not perform path validation of the workspace directory while serving report files, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to retrieve Surefire failures, PMD violations, Findbugs bugs, and Checkstyle errors on the controller file system by editing the workspace path.

item.title: CVE-2024-34144|2024-08-02T02:42:59.914Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving crafted constructor bodies in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-34145|2024-08-02T02:43:00.455Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20script%20security%20plugin
item.description: A sandbox bypass vulnerability involving sandbox-defined classes that shadow specific non-sandbox-defined classes in Jenkins Script Security Plugin 1335.vf07d9ce377a_e and earlier allows attackers with permission to define and run sandboxed scripts, including Pipelines, to bypass the sandbox protection and execute arbitrary code in the context of the Jenkins controller JVM.

item.title: CVE-2024-34148|2024-08-02T02:51:09.888Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20subversion%20partial%20release%20manager%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Subversion Partial Release Manager Plugin 1.0.1 and earlier programmatically disables the fix for CVE-2016-3721 whenever a build is triggered from a release tag, by setting the Java system property 'hudson.model.ParametersAction.keepUndefinedParameters'.

item.title: CVE-2024-34146|2024-08-02T02:42:59.969Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20git%20server%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Git server Plugin 114.v068a_c7cc2574 and earlier does not perform a permission check for read access to a Git repository over SSH, allowing attackers with a previously configured SSH public key but lacking Overall/Read permission to access these repositories.

item.title: CVE-2024-34147|2024-08-02T02:51:09.825Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20telegram%20bot%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Telegram Bot Plugin 1.4.0 and earlier stores the Telegram Bot token unencrypted in its global configuration file on the Jenkins controller where it can be viewed by users with access to the Jenkins controller file system.
